values: 重量；体重；重物；砝码；影响力；重要性；负担；压力；权重；权数；重量单位；负荷；压迫感；重任

加重量于…；重压（weight的过去分词）
重量为…；具有重要性；成为…的重荷；起锚

word_group.brief_definition: 体重；身体重量；人体体重
人多势众, 团队力量(或影响)
(尤指疲乏时)坐下歇歇脚, 坐下喘口气
word_group.phrase: take the weight off your feet

word_group.brief_definition: 很大的担心；重大的责任

bilingual.source: Visitors who walk among the buildings can feel both the weight of history and a wonderful sense of peace.
bilingual.target: 在建筑间行走的游客可以感受到历史的重量和美妙的宁静感。

bilingual.source: The avoirdupois weight of the package was exactly 10 pounds.
bilingual.target: 包裹的重量单位重量正好是10磅。

bilingual.source: What is the weight of this box?
bilingual.target: 这个箱子的重量是多少？

bilingual.source: Bend your elbow to lift the weight.
bilingual.target: 弯曲你的肘部来举起重量。

bilingual.source: The weight of this package is two kg.
bilingual.target: 这个包裹的重量是两千克。

bilingual.source: The weight of the armour made him slow.
bilingual.target: 铁甲的重量让他行动缓慢。

bilingual.source: This bridge can bear a lot of weight.
bilingual.target: 这座桥能够承受很大的重量。

bilingual.source: The weight of the object is 10 lbm.
bilingual.target: 这个物体的重量是10磅质量。

bilingual.source: The abutment supports the weight of the bridge.

list.abstract: Weight（英[weɪt]，美[weɪt]），英语单词，作名词用，为重量；分量；体重。作动词用，为压住；视…为重要；重视。短语搭配有lose weight（减肥），例句为“Elimination of forced weight loss by models.（消除模型的强制减重。）” Weight名词类近义词有significance、burden、stress等，反义词为unburden，动词形式为weighted、weigh，形容词形式为weighty、weightless，过去式为weighted。

yingyinNormal.en: A cold fusion of two universal elements, identical in weight, equal in force.
yingyinNormal.zh: 两个通用元素冷聚变，重量一致，力量均等。

yingyinNormal.en: I heard your friends laughing. You score points based on your clients' weight, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我听到你的朋友们在笑，你们以客户重量来打分？

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you. And that's a whole lot of weight. That really...That kind of hurts my feelings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢，而且以非常大的重量。这真是...让我很难受

yingyinNormal.en: I'll just climb up and get it. The tree's much too thin to take your weight, Daddy Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我就爬上去把它拿下来。这些树枝太细了，根本承受不了的你的重量。

yingyinNormal.en: But I need to know how to tie the correct knots. I need to know what kind of cable to use the weight, the thickness, the load strength.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要知道如何绑正确的结，要用哪种钢索，它的重量、粗细和强度。

yingyinNormal.en: Your weight was 151,510 pounds, wind and temperature north, northwest, 21°. Speed and altitude 200 knots at 2,818 feet. Agree? Correct.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你飞机的重量是68.7吨，风向和温度分别是西北偏北和零下6度，速度和高度分别是370公里/小时和859米，对吗？对。

yingyinNormal.en: Or do we just throw our weight around?
yingyinNormal.zh: 还是只要用泰山压顶?

yingyinNormal.en: You trying to guess my weight? Excuse me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在目测我的体重吗？你说什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Come on honey, let's go drink our body weight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们去喝个痛快。

yingyinNormal.en: And as you walk, your weight could crack a bolt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 走在上面，你的体重可能弄断螺栓。

yingyinNormal.en: Lose the damn weight. You want to say that again? I'm gonna lose the damn weight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 减掉这身该死的肥肉。要再说一遍吗？我要减掉这身该死的肥肉。

yingyinNormal.en: The tree's much too thin to take your weight, Daddy Pig!
yingyinNormal.zh: 这树太细了，承受不了你的体重，猪爸爸！

yingyinNormal.en: I use quite a bit of my body weight down through my hands.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我用一点身体的力量来增加手劲。

yingyinNormal.en: And if I were to shift my weight, I would become a wire walker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要身体的重心一改变，我就成了走钢索人。

yingyinNormal.en: You're kidding. And it looks like she lost a lot of weight, damn it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是吧。她好像瘦了不少，可恶。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you carry your weight? Yes, Sergeant. Should be easy for you then.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你撑得住体重吗？是，中士。对你来说肯定轻松。

yingyinNormal.en: My sister, she wanted to lose weight anyway. Bet she never looked better.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我姐姐一天到晚就想着减肥，但是她从没瘦下来过。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh my God. Rachel. You look terrific. Oh, so do you. Did you lose weight?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天哪，瑞秋。你看起来太不可思议了。你也是，你是不是瘦了？

yingyinNormal.en: The kid always finds something to do, and God knows Woz pulls his weight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个孩子也总能找点事干，沃兹却在增加体重给上帝看

yingyinNormal.en: I've got to get a handle on myself, on the weight and on all of it. And I…
yingyinNormal.zh: 我必须要掌控自己，控制体重，掌控自己的一切。我…

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 重量；分量；体重；重物；影响力；重；权重；砝码；重量单位；权数

word_family.mean: v. 称…的重量；考虑；权衡

examination_example.sentence: Since <highlight>weight</highlight> loss is not my goal, it is less important for me to track my <highlight>weight</highlight> each week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为减肥不是我的目标，所以每周记录体重对我来说就不那么重要了。

examination_example.sentence: Many employers have instituted <highlight>weight</highlight> loss and fitness initiatives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多雇主已经制定了减肥和健身计划。

examination_example.sentence: An adult with a BMI of 18 to 25 is often considered to be normal <highlight>weight</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个成年人的身体质量指数在18到25之间通常被认为是正常体重。

examination_example.sentence: In musical expression, he did not feel restrained by the <highlight>weight</highlight> of convention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在音乐表达上，他并不觉得受到传统的影响。

sense_info_list.en: to fasten something heavy to something

examination_example.sentence: It is deeply uncomfortable – it's the emotional equivalent of wearing a jacket <highlight>weighted</highlight> with stones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这让人非常不舒服，这感觉就像穿着一件装了石头的夹克。

word_usage.usage:
weight指“重量；分量”、“重的特性”、“重力”时，是不可数名词。例：
I just hoped the branch would take my weight.
我只是希望树枝经得住我的体重。

weight表示“重任；负担”、“重要性、严重性”时，通常只用于单数形式。例：
The full weight of responsibility falls on her.
全部的重任都落在了她的肩上。

weight还可作“秤砣；砝码”、“重物”解，是可数名词。例：
She lifts weights as part of her training.
举杠铃是她锻炼的一部分。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 分量; 重要性; 影响

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 重量；分量；体重；重物；影响力；重；权重；砝码；重量单位；权数
adj. 沉重的；重的；十分重要的；极其严肃的；具有重要影响的

word_family.mean: v. 称…的重量；考虑；权衡

examination_example.sentence: If calories taken in are less than calories expended, <highlight>weight</highlight> shall be lost, and so it is with money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果摄入的热量少于消耗的热量，体重就会减轻，金钱也是如此。

examination_example.sentence: I'm always baffled when I see shelves bursting with various vitamins, extracts and other supplements, all promising to accelerate or promote <highlight>weight</highlight> loss.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我看到货架上摆满了各种各样的维生素、提取物和其他补充剂，都承诺加速或促进减肥时，我总是感到困惑。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Weight</highlight> loss is dictated by the laws of arithmetic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 减肥受算术法则支配。

sense_info_list.zh: 分量; 重要性; 影响

examination_example.sentence: If someone you know, like, and trust believes a radical idea, you are more likely to give it merit, <highlight>weight</highlight>, or consideration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你认识、喜欢并信任的人相信一个激进的想法，你更有可能给予它价值、分量或考虑。

word_usage.usage:
weight是名词，不及物动词是weigh。
示例：他体重120磅。
误 He weights 120 pounds.
正 He weighs 120 pounds.
正 His weight is 120 pounds.

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

examination_example.sentence: Another cause is that the proportion of people who are trying to lose <highlight>weight</highlight> has been increasing over time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个原因是，随着时间的推移，试图减肥的人的比例一直在增加。

examination_example.sentence: Americans spend billions of dollars each year trying to change their <highlight>weight</highlight> with diets, gym memberships and plastic surgery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国人每年花费数十亿美元试图通过节食、健身和整形手术来改变体重。

examination_example.sentence: Their <highlight>weight</highlight> will go down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的体重会下降。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>weight</highlight> of the evidence is on the side of pre-K that early intervention works.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 证据的重要性在学前教育方面，即早期干预是有效的。

word_usage.usage:
weight是名词，不及物动词是weigh。
示例：他体重120磅。
误 He weights 120 pounds.
正 He weighs 120 pounds.
正 His weight is 120 pounds.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 重量；分量；体重；重物；影响力；重；权重；砝码；重量单位；权数

word_family.mean: v. 称…的重量；考虑；权衡

examination_example.sentence: As someone noted in this paper a couple of ago, they eat great food and never gain <highlight>weight</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如几年前有人在这篇论文中提到的，他们吃很棒的食物，而且从不发胖。

examination_example.sentence: A Swiss study reported that while the <highlight>weight</highlight> of electronic goods represented by precious metals was relatively small in comparison to total waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 瑞士的一项研究报告称，以贵重金属为代表的电子产品的重量与总废弃物相比相对较小。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 体重；身体重量；人体体重

sense_info_list.zh: 重量; 分量; 体重

examination_example.sentence: "Health" means eating well, getting enough exercise, and having a healthy <highlight>weight</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “健康”是指吃得好、运动足够、体重健康。

examination_example.sentence: C. Give some examples of losing <highlight>weight</highlight> successfully.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 举一些成功减肥的例子。

examination_example.sentence: Having no breakfast will not help you lose <highlight>weight</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不吃早餐不会帮助你减肥。

examination_example.sentence: She felt the <highlight>weight</highlight> of her parents' sacrifices on her shoulders and worked hard to make them proud.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她感到父母牺牲的重担压在她的肩上，努力工作使他们感到骄傲。

examination_example.sentence: He felt like there was a heavy <highlight>weight</highlight> on his shoulders as he walked home alone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个人走回家的路上，他感觉自己肩上的责任很重。

word_usage.usage:
weight是名词，不及物动词是weigh。
示例：他体重120磅。
误 He weights 120 pounds.
正 He weighs 120 pounds.
正 His weight is 120 pounds.
